ならばその資格たる証――
<COL b92828><SPAI NAME> <SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を我に示せ
MsgEn:
Arisen――
Do you desire a new "Myrmidon's Pledge" with a pawn?
If so, prove to me your qualification by presenting <COL b92828> <SPAI NUM> pieces of <SPAI NAME></COL>.

MsgJp:
――ううむ、覚者よ
そなたはまだ新たな契約を交わす段階にあらず
すでに己が器に応じた数の戦徒を統べているようだ
MsgEn:
--Ummm, Arisen,
you are not yet ready to sign a new contract,
it seems that you already control a number of Myrmidions in accordance with your capacity.

MsgJp:
――覚者よ
どうやらまだ、戦徒との新たな契約に
必要な数の<COL b92828><SPAI NAME></COL>を
持ってはおらぬようだな
MsgEn:
--Arisen,
apparently you don't yet have the required
number of<COL b92828><SPAI NAME></COL>
for a new contract with the Myrmidions!

MsgJp:
契約に必要な数、<COL b92828><SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を手に入れてのち
再び我にその証を示すがよい――
MsgEn:
After you have the <COL b92828><SPAI NUM>pieces</COL> required for the covenant
Show me the proof again...

MsgJp:
――よかろう
力を授かるべき者よ、我が前に――
MsgEn:
--I am ready.
You who are to be given power, before me--

MsgJp: 沈黙こそ我が意力の糧――
MsgEn: Silence is the food of my willpower.

MsgJp: 語るべき言葉――今はない
MsgEn: The words to speak――Now there are none

MsgJp:
波を感じる――
はるか遠く、地平の彼方――
MsgEn:
Feel the waves--
far, far beyond the horizon--

MsgJp: 真に強き魂あらば、闇は消え去る――
MsgEn: When the soul is truly strong, the darkness will disappear.

MsgJp: 覚者の使命、ゆめゆめ忘れるな
MsgEn: The mission of the Arisen, don't ever forget it.

MsgJp: 惑いし者よ、畏れずに眼（まなこ）を開け
MsgEn: Oh, bewildered one, open your eyes without fear

MsgJp: 義なき怒りは、身を滅ぼす――
MsgEn: Anger without righteousness destroys--

MsgJp:
鍛錬せよ
おまえたちは抜き身の刃――研がねば、朽ちる
MsgEn:
Train yourself
You are the unsheathed blade――Sharpen or decay

MsgJp: ――いましばし――休息を許せ――
MsgEn: --For now... allow me to rest.

MsgJp: 全てを見通すことはまだ――できぬか――
MsgEn: I don't know if you've seen it all yet... or if you haven't.

MsgJp:
広く伝えよ――
覚者にならんと思う者――我は拒まぬ
MsgEn:
Spread the word--
Whoever wants to become an Arisen--I will not reject them.

MsgJp: 覚者よ――人の時代を記憶し――愛でるがいい
MsgEn: Arisen, remember the era of humans and cherish it with love.

MsgJp: 覚者よ、風となり大地を駆けよ――我が魂を運べ
MsgEn: Arisen, become the wind and race across the earth - carry my soul

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
自らの出自を忘れるな
MsgEn:
O Arisen one--
Remember where you come from.

MsgJp: あれから３００年以上の時が過ぎている――
MsgEn: More than 300 years have passed since then.

MsgJp:
我にとっても短くはない時間だ
いわんや、人間にとっては――
MsgEn:
It's not a short time for me either.
For a man, no less...

MsgJp: 竜なき世界――
MsgEn: A world without dragons —

MsgJp:
このレスタニアを竜なき世界にすることだけは
避けねばならぬ――
MsgEn:
We must not let Lestania become a land without dragons.
We must avoid--

MsgJp: ――どうした
MsgEn: --What's the matter?

MsgJp:
――いや、眠っていたわけではない
ただ、時折――意識が失せるのだ
MsgEn:
-- no, I wasn't asleep
just occasionally -- I'd lose consciousness.

MsgJp: 覚者よ――何用だ
MsgEn: Arisen, what do you want?

MsgJp:
我が加護を、おまえたちの言葉に乗せて
民たちに運ぶのだ
MsgEn:
My blessings in your words.
Carry my favor to your people.

MsgJp: わたしには休息が必要だ
MsgEn: I need rest.

MsgJp:
覚者よ
我が目となり、耳となり――頼むぞ
MsgEn:
O Arisen One,
Be my eyes and ears - I beseech you.

MsgJp:
常ならぬ気配は弱まるどころかさらに強くなる
あの娘が強い気を発してるが
それだけではない――
MsgEn:
The unusual presence doesn't weaken, it grows stronger.
The girl emits a strong spirit, but that's not the only thing--

MsgJp:
漂う穢れた気は――
魔物どもが発するもののようだ
MsgEn:
The impure aura emanating from them seems similar to what
monsters emit

MsgJp:
異国の娘から目を離すな――
罪はなくとも、災いを呼び寄せるのはあの娘だ
MsgEn:
Do not take your eyes off the foreign girl――
Even though she is innocent, it is that girl who brings disaster upon us

MsgJp: 黒き鎧の災いは――厄介だぞ
MsgEn: The curse of the black armor is troublesome, indeed

MsgJp:
覚者よ
若い人間の不安定な心――
MsgEn:
Arisen.
The unstable mind of a young human--

MsgJp:
その掌握は我が手に余る
目を離すなよ
MsgEn:
It's out of my control.
Keep an eye on it.

MsgJp:
ふむ――
我が力、自覚以上に失われているようだ
MsgEn:
Hmm.
I seem to have lost more of my power than I realized.

MsgJp:
しばし眠るが――
まどろみの中でも、気の変化はわかる
――案ずることはない
MsgEn:
I sleep for a while, but--
even in slumber, I know when your spirit has changed.
--don't worry...

MsgJp:
去った者のことは忘れることだ
頼りたいと思った時――
おまえの負けが決まるだろう
MsgEn:
Forget about those who have departed. 
The moment you think of depending on them...
is the moment you seal your defeat

MsgJp:
目下の敵の向こうに真の敵がいるはずだ
その姿を見逃すでないぞ
MsgEn:
Beyond the enemy at hand, there must be a true enemy.
Don't lose sight of that.

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
レスタニアを巡り、民の力となれ
我が加護を、あまねく伝えるのだ
MsgEn:
Arisen.
I call upon you to travel throughout the land of Lestania and help your people.
Spread my blessing far and wide.

MsgJp:
悪意は消えぬ――
そこかしこの闇に潜む黒き悪意――
MsgEn:
The malice will not disappear —
The black malice that lurks in every corner of the darkness.

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
自らの闇を凝視せよ――
MsgEn:
Arisen, 
Gaze upon your own darkness――

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
事を急げ――
邪気は日ごと強くなる――
MsgEn:
Arisen ones――
Hasten your actions――
The malevolent energy grows stronger every day――

MsgJp:
邪気が少しばかり薄らいだようだ
おかしい――
いや、息を潜めているつもりだろうか――
MsgEn:
It seems that the evil aura has slightly subsided.
Strange...
No, perhaps it's just hiding its presence...

MsgJp:
邪悪な気の流れ――
おまえたちも感ずることが
できればいいのだが――
MsgEn:
The flow of evil energy--
If you could feel it...
If only you could sense it, too.

MsgJp:
後悔の渦に足を取られるな
前を見た者だけが川を渡ることができるのだ
MsgEn:
Do not let yourself be dragged down by the whirlpool of regret.
Only those who look ahead can cross the river.

MsgJp:
ふん――
レオめ――
MsgEn:
Oh...
Leo...

MsgJp: ふむ――いいだろう――
MsgEn: Hmm... I see. Alright then...

MsgJp:
セシリーは覚者ではあるが
未だ途上の覚者――
我が覚者よ――その原因を探すのだ
MsgEn:
Cecily is an Arisen,
but still an aspiring one――
Oh, my Arisen―― search for the cause of it.

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
我が力、レスタニアの外へは届かぬ
大地と人を味方にして力とするがいい
MsgEn:
Arisen――
My power cannot reach beyond the borders of Lestania.
Let earth and man be your allies and your strength!

MsgJp:
フィンダムの竜への敬意――
けして忘れてはならぬ
MsgEn:
In reverence to the dragons of Phindym,
never to be forgotten.

MsgJp:
敵意――悪意――我ら竜が最も鋭敏に
感じる意識だ
MsgEn:
Arisen...
 Hostility - Malice - It is the sensation that we, the dragons, most keenly sense.

MsgJp: ふむ――異郷の匂いがするぞ
MsgEn: Hm... I sense the scent of a foreign land.

MsgJp:
竜を救え――
竜だけが我々に真実を語ることができるだろう
MsgEn:
Save the dragon--
Only the dragon will be able to tell us the truth.

MsgJp:
異変の原因は大地の病か――
ふむ――
覚者たちよ――これは根深いぞ――
MsgEn:
Is the cause of the anomaly the illness of the land--?
Hmm-- 
Oh, Arisen-- this is deeply rooted--

MsgJp: 《原始の雫》――はて、知らぬわ
MsgEn: 《Primeval Drops》 - Hm, I do not know.

MsgJp:
竜と大地と民――
崩れた均衡を調和の中に戻すのは
難しい――心して、事に当たれ
MsgEn:
Dragons, the earth, and the people--
To restore the collapsed balance harmoniously is difficult
--approach with care and sincerity.

MsgJp: 人は竜と大地の下僕のように思えるかもしれない
MsgEn: One may appear to be a servant of the dragon and the earth

MsgJp:
しかし、覚者よ――学ぶがよい
人の思いは、時に、竜をも狂わせるのだ
MsgEn:
However, Arisen, it is good to learn. 
The thoughts of man can sometimes drive even dragons mad.

MsgJp: （目を閉じ、何かを考えているようだ）
MsgEn: (With their eyes closed, they seem to be deep in thought)

MsgJp:
フィンダムの竜を見よ
意識が途切れ――乱れているようだ
MsgEn:
Behold the dragon of Phindym:
His consciousness is faltering - it appears to be in turmoil..

MsgJp:
竜に意識を向けろ
一時たりとも忘れるな
MsgEn: Direct your attention towards the dragon. Never forget, even for a moment.

MsgJp:
精霊竜は己を知っている
それ故、セシリーをここへ送り込んだのだ
――判断の正しさを見せてやれ
MsgEn:
The spirit dragon knows itself.
That's why they sent Cecily here.
--Show them the truth of their decision.

MsgJp:
道理を外れた世界も、これで理の中に
戻るだろう
MsgEn: Worlds that stray from order, will return to order with this.

MsgJp:
過去に類無き空の火球――
理の盤石が揺らいでいるというのか――
MsgEn:
A fireball in the sky like never before...
The very foundation of order is being shaken...

MsgJp:
理の揺らぎを感じる――
何が起こるというのか――
MsgEn:
I feel a shifting of order--
What is going to happen--?

MsgJp:
ふむ――匂いが変わったな
彼の地の竜力は焼けた匂いがする
MsgEn:
Hmm... The smell has changed. 
The dragon force of this land smells burnt.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の気配はないか――
気の乱れを見逃すなよ
MsgEn: No sign of the evil dragon...

MsgJp:
王子は、黒い竜に倒されたとする火竜と
如何ほどの時を過ごしたのだろうか――
MsgEn: How much time did the prince spend with the fire dragon, who was supposedly slain by the black dragon?

MsgJp: “悪しき竜”からの接触はないのか？
MsgEn: No contact from the "evil dragon"?

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランの習わしでは
王子が竜を継ぐはずだ
MsgEn:
According to Acre Selund custom,
the prince is supposed to inherit the dragon.

MsgJp:
おまえが“悪しき竜”ならどうする
野放しにしておくだろうか――
MsgEn:
What if you were an "evil dragon"?
I wouldn't let it run wild.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランの幼き覚者を守り
覚者の道を教えられるのは
おまえたちの他にはいない
MsgEn:
To protect the young Arisen of Acre Selund,
and teach them the path of the Arisen,
there is no one else but you.

MsgJp: “悪しき竜”の目的が見えぬ
MsgEn: The purpose of the "evil dragon" is unclear

MsgJp:
よもやとは思うが――
ネド王子の言動に気をつけるがよい
MsgEn: While it may seem unlikely, it is advisable to be wary of Prince Nedo's demeanor and actions.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”が竜力を手放すとは思えん
となれば力尽くで奪うことになるのだろうか
果たして可能だろうか――
MsgEn:
I find it hard to believe that the "evil dragon" would willingly relinquish its power.
If that is the case, would it be possible to forcefully take it with all our strength?
Is it truly feasible...?

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”が持つ竜力の行方が
アッカーシェランの未来を決めることに
なるだろう
MsgEn: The whereabouts of the "Evil Dragon" and its Dragon Force will determine the future of Acre Selund.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の思惑がどうであれ
その竜力はネド王子が継承可能となれば
目指す道はひとつだな

“悪しき竜”にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
MsgEn:
It seems that the "Evil Dragon" is conceited,
just like a human
That could be its weakness

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
MsgEn:
It seems that the "Evil Dragon" is conceited,
just like a human
That could be its weakness

MsgJp:
大きな戦いの時は“悪しき竜”の動向に
気を配るのだ
MsgEn: In the great battle, you must watch out for the "evil dragon."

MsgJp:
おまえたちの勝利は“悪しき竜”の思惑に
どう影響するのか――
MsgEn: How will your victory affect the evil dragon's agenda...

MsgJp: そろそろ姿を現すかもしれないぞ
MsgEn: Maybe they'll show themselves soon.

MsgJp:
いよいよ“悪しき竜”の本拠を目指すと聞く
気の変化を見逃すなよ
MsgEn:
I hear you're finally heading to the home of the "evil dragons"
Keep an eye out for disturbances in nature.

MsgJp:
黒い鎧の騎士――
正体の見極めを急いでくれ
MsgEn:
The knight in black armor--
I need you to hurry up and find out who he is.

MsgJp:
そうか――黒い鎧の騎士は
姿を見せぬか
MsgEn:
Well--the knight in black armor is
nowhere to be seen.

MsgJp: 竜力を――取り返さねば――
MsgEn: We must take back the dragon's force.

MsgJp: 声が――聞こえる――
MsgEn: I hear... voices...

MsgJp: ミシアル――
MsgEn: Mysial--

MsgJp:
あと少し――生かしてくれ――
やり残した――ことが――
MsgEn:
I need you to let me live a little longer.
I've got... some unfinished business....

MsgJp: 我が奪われし竜力はまだか――
MsgEn: My stolen dragon force is not yet--

MsgJp: 幸い竜力はすべて戻ったようだ
MsgEn: Fortunately, all dragon force seems to have returned.

MsgJp:
我が肉体が潤えばじきに大地も
元に戻るだろう
MsgEn:
If my body is nourished, 
soon the earth will also return to its original state.

MsgJp:
さあ、行くがよい
ここは――わたしはもう大丈夫だ
MsgEn:
Go on, go on, go.
Here, I'm all right now.

MsgJp:
王子の行動は自信と確信に満ちている
そうは思わないか？
MsgEn:
The prince's actions are filled with confidence and conviction.
Don't you think so?

MsgJp: “悪しき竜”はまだ動かぬか――
MsgEn: The "Evil Dragon" has not yet moved.

MsgJp:
王子の持つ笛とはいかなる理が
はたらくものなのだろうか――
MsgEn:
What logic is there in knowing that the prince has a flute...
I wonder if it works

MsgJp:
笛があれば竜に勝てると
王子は信じているようだが――
MsgEn: The prince seems to believe that with a flute, he can beat the dragon--

MsgJp:
敵の狙いが見えぬ――
理に傷を付け何を求めるのか――
MsgEn:
The enemy's aim is unclear--
What do they seek by undermining order?--

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”をよく見ておいてくれ
同じことがこの地に起こらないとは
言えないからな
MsgEn: Be sure to take a good look at the 'Evil Dragon,' as we cannot say for certain that the same thing will not happen in this land.

MsgJp:
大切な話がある
心身ともに健やかな時に――頼む
MsgEn:
I have something important to tell you.
When you're healthy, both mentally and physically-- please.

MsgJp:
顔色が、すぐれぬようですね
どうかご自愛を
MsgEn:
You don't look well.
Please take care of yourself.

MsgJp: 白竜様の言葉こそ、導（しるべ）の光――
MsgEn: The words of the White Dragon are indeed the guiding light.

MsgJp:
迷った時は、耳をすませてください
白竜様の教えがあなたを導くでしょう
MsgEn: When in doubt, listen, and let the teachings of The White Dragon guide you!

MsgJp:
心の水面が平らかならば
本来、誰にでも竜の心は伝わるのです
MsgEn: If the surface of the heart is calm, then the true essence of the dragon's heart can be understood by anyone.

MsgJp:
いまは少し――心持ちが乱れています
お待ちを――
MsgEn:
I'm a little... distracted at the moment.
Please be patient.

MsgJp:
あなたは覚者です
苦難の道は――避けられません
MsgEn: You are an Arisen. The path of hardship cannot be avoided.

MsgJp:
人は弱きもの――それゆえ
その力を紡ぎ、束ねんとするのです
MsgEn: Humans are weak ―― that is why we weave together and gather our strength.

MsgJp:
信じましょう
白竜様の大いなる加護を
MsgEn:
Let us believe in 
the great blessings of the White Dragon.

MsgJp:
争いのない世を望みながらも、我らの手は
戦の血で汚れていく――虚しきことです
MsgEn:
We hope for a world without strife, but our hands are stained with the blood of
war - a vain thing!

MsgJp:
語るべき何か――伝えるべき何か――
大切な言葉はいつも白竜様が教えてくれます
そう――わたし自身の言葉ではないのです
MsgEn:
Something to tell — something to convey...
The important words are always taught by The White Dragon.
Yes — it is not my own words.

MsgJp: こんにちは、覚者さん
MsgEn: Hello, Arisen

MsgJp:
おかえりなさい
時に、皆さんとのご挨拶がまだでは？
MsgEn: Welcome back. By the way, have I greeted everyone yet?

MsgJp: 白竜様が回復される日までともに頑張りましょう
MsgEn: Until the day The White Dragon is restored, let's do our best together

MsgJp:
自由に振る舞う覚者が増えていますが
白竜様あっての覚者であることだけは
心に留めておいてください
MsgEn: There are more Arisen behaving freely, but please always keep in mind that it is thanks to The White Dragon that they exist.

MsgJp:
騎士団と覚者の揉め事に
巻き込まれてしまったと聞きました
大丈夫でしたか？
MsgEn: I heard that you got involved in a dispute between the Knights order and the Arisen. Are you okay?

MsgJp:
いがみ合いが元気の源だという人もいるようですが
わたしにはまったく理解できません――
MsgEn:
Some people seem to think that bickering is the source of energy.
I don't understand it at all--I've never understood it.

MsgJp:
アルヴァーには会えましたか？
早く契約までいけると良いですね
MsgEn:
Did you get to meet Alvar?
I hope you can get to the contract soon.

MsgJp:
わたしは契約のお手伝いをすることに
なっていますので、その時を楽しみにして
待っていますね
MsgEn:
I'm supposed to help with the contract
, so I'm looking forward to that time

MsgJp:
お手伝いできてうれしく思っています
これで押しも押されもせぬ立派な覚者ですね
MsgEn:
I'm happy to help
Now you're a well-known Arisen!

MsgJp:
覚者になってまだ日が浅いのに
《ブラッドオーブ》を持ち帰るなんて――
MsgEn: Even though it has only been a short time since becoming an Arisen, I can't believe you brought back a "Blood Orb"

MsgJp:
白竜様がこっそりご加護をくださったのかも
しれませんね
MsgEn: Maybe the White Dragon has secretly given us a blessing

MsgJp:
オークの臭いがするなどと騒いだりして
ごめんなさい
あの臭いが恐ろしくてならないのです
MsgEn:
I'm sorry I made such a fuss about the smell of orcs.
I'm sorry...
I'm afraid of that smell.

MsgJp:
メイリーフの素性を知ったのですか？
あの一族は、今や、このレスタニアの宝石です
MsgEn:
Have you learned of Mayleaf's true identity?
That family is now the jewel of this Lestania.

MsgJp:
魔物たちの標的になっても不思議では
ありません
どうか、気にしてあげてくださいね
MsgEn:
No wonder they were the target of demons.
Please, please, please take care of them!

MsgJp:
白竜様の回復は一進一退――
特に石化の症状は油断がなりません
MsgEn:
The White Dragon's recovery has been a step in the right direction--
The petrification symptoms can be especially tricky!

MsgJp: 《ブラッドオーブ》がもっと手に入れば――
MsgEn: If only I could get more Blood Orbs.

MsgJp:
イリスの様子はやはり変ですね
わたしが話したがっていると伝えてくれますか？
MsgEn:
Iris is still acting weird.
Can you tell her I want to talk to her?

MsgJp:
レオが白竜様を見つめていました
思い詰めているようでしたが――
MsgEn:
Leo was staring at The White Dragon
He seemed to be pondering--

MsgJp:
大変な戦いだったと聞いています
断ち切られた人生も多かったと――
MsgEn:
I hear it was a tough fight,
and a lot of lives were cut short--

MsgJp:
でも、白竜様に捧げられた命は
けして無駄にはなりません
MsgEn: But the lives dedicated to the White Dragon will not be in vain.

MsgJp:
白竜様が空を飛ぶお姿――
いつか見たいものですね
MsgEn:
I hope to see the White Dragon flying in the sky--
one day!

MsgJp:
エルフの仲間が面倒を見るということであれば
その方がメイリーフにとっては良いことなのかも
しれませんね――
MsgEn:
If it means that the elf's friends will be taken care of,
it might be better for Mayleaf.
Maybe--

MsgJp: イリスは――心配ですね
MsgEn: Iris--I'm worried.

MsgJp: 今後もこのようなことが起こるのでしょうか――
MsgEn: Will this continue to happen in the future--?

MsgJp:
下の街の皆さんが安心して暮らせるように
どうかよろしくお願いしますね
MsgEn:
I hope everyone in the city below can live in peace.
Please do help us to do so.

MsgJp:
持ち去ったエルフの命――
敵はいったいどうするつもりでしょう
MsgEn:
The life of an elf taken away...
What will the enemy do?

MsgJp:
強く、澄み切った命でした
彼の命のあり方は素晴らしい
MsgEn:
It was a strong, clear life.
The way he lived his life was amazing.

MsgJp: ――感謝しなくてはなりませんね
MsgEn: I have to say--thank you for that.

MsgJp:
白竜様の回復にはまだ時間がかかるようです
これからもわたしたちでお守りしなくては――
MsgEn:
It will take some time for The White Dragon to recover.
We must continue to protect him--

MsgJp: 無理をきいてくれてありがとうございました
MsgEn: Thank you for taking on the impossible.

MsgJp:
少し、甘えてしまったかもしれません
これからは気をつけますね
MsgEn:
I may have spoiled it a little
I'll be careful from now on.

MsgJp: イリスのことを聞きましたが――
MsgEn: I heard about Iris--

MsgJp:
もう、昔のようには戻れないのですか？
あなたはどんな印象を受けましたか？
MsgEn:
Can we go back to the way things used to be?
What impression did you get?

MsgJp: 敵はディアマンテス――
MsgEn: The enemy is Diamantes--

MsgJp:
オークの時のようにうまく想像できませんが
でも、白竜様が強い憎しみの気を放っている――
それだけはわかるのです
MsgEn:
I can't envision it as well as I did with the orcs.
But The White Dragon is radiating a strong aura of hatred--
that much I know!

MsgJp:
ああ、ごめん
今は特に話すことはないよ
MsgEn:
Oh, sorry
I don't really have anything to tell you right now.

MsgJp:
君と雑談？
いいね！　よし、共通の話題を探そうよ
MsgEn:
Having a little chat with you?
Great!　Okay, let's find something we have in common.

MsgJp:
すまないけど、少し考えたいことがあるんだ
後で話そうよ
MsgEn:
Sorry, I just have a few things to think about.
We can talk later.

MsgJp:
おや、疲れたのかい？
覚者も無敵ってわけじゃないんだな
MsgEn:
Oh, you're tired, aren't you?
I guess even the Arisen aren't invincible.

MsgJp:
適材適所って言うだろ？
そう、僕は武ではなく、知で攻めるのさ
MsgEn:
You know what they say about the right person for the right job?
Yes, I attack with wisdom, not military prowess.

MsgJp:
常識にとらわれないこと
それが、平凡を非凡に変えるんだ
MsgEn:
Thinking outside the box 
That's what transforms ordinary into extraordinary

MsgJp:
不安と期待が入り交じるこの気持ち――
説明が難しいね
MsgEn:
This feeling of mixed anxiety and anticipation--
It's hard to explain.

MsgJp:
まだ読んでいない書物、まだ試していない実験――
心残りがあるうちは、死ねないよ
MsgEn:
Books you haven't read yet, experiments you haven't tried yet--
You can't die while you have regrets.

MsgJp:
この世界は好きかい？
僕は好きだよ
知れば知るほど――もっと知りたくなる
MsgEn:
Do you like this world?
I do.
The more you know-- the more you want to know.

MsgJp:
思い立ったら、すぐに行動！
待っていても発見は無いからね
MsgEn:
When you have an idea, act on it immediately!
You won't find anything if you wait.

MsgJp: ん？　どうしたんだい？
MsgEn: Hmm?　What's wrong?

MsgJp:
やあ、新人さん
最初は誰彼かまわず顔を売っておくといいよ
MsgEn: Hello, new person. It's good to make yourself known to everyone at first, regardless of who they are.

MsgJp:
《ブラッドオーブ》のことは
常に気にしておくといいよ
見つけると確実に一目置かれるからね
MsgEn:
It's good to always keep in mind about the 《Blood Orb》,
 because when you find it, you're sure to be admired.

MsgJp:
覚者と騎士団の反目に巻き込まれて
僕は処世術を学んだんだ
MsgEn:
I learned the art of worldly wisdom
being caught up in the conflict between the Arisen and the knights.

MsgJp:
――と前向きに考えることにするよ
これも処世術と言えないこともないね
MsgEn:
--I'm going to try to think positively
and this is another way to get by, I guess.

MsgJp:
――！？　ああ、ごめんごめん
ちょっと考え事をね
MsgEn:
――!? Ah, sorry, sorry
I was just thinking about something

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様の助手になって以来初めての
大仕事を仰せつかって、その計画をね――
ふふふ――
MsgEn: Since becoming Joseph's assistant, this is the first big job I've been entrusted with, and I am now tasked with the planning... hehehe...

MsgJp: 空から降ってきた巨大な石碑――
MsgEn: A gigantic stone monument fell from the sky...

MsgJp:
まだ正体はわからないんだけど
どこかに落ちたらしいんだ
うわさか何か聞いてないかい？
MsgEn:
I still do not know what it truly is, but
it seems to have fallen somewhere
Have you heard any rumors or something?

MsgJp:
反省しています――はい
ああ、君か――また叱られるのかと思ったよ
MsgEn:
I'm reflecting on it--yes.
Oh, it's you--I thought I was going to be scolded again.

MsgJp:
いや、君にも心配かけたよね
迎えに来てくれてありがとう
本当に感謝しているよ
MsgEn:
No, I caused you to worry too, didn't I?
Thank you for coming to pick me up.
I really appreciate it.

MsgJp:
ごめん！
アークの調査報告が最優先でね
あちこち気が回らないんだよ
MsgEn:
Sorry!
The Ark's investigation report is the top priority.
I can't focus on other things.

MsgJp:
アーク調査の報告書がまだだというのに
古文書の解読まで――
MsgEn: Despite the fact that the report on the Ark investigation is not yet complete, up until the deciphering of the ancient documents--

MsgJp:
でも、君が持ち帰った古文書は面白そうで――
まずいな――ジョゼフ様に叱られるよ
MsgEn:
But, the old document you took home seems interesting...
Uh-oh... I'm going to get scolded by Joseph, aren't I?

MsgJp:
イリスとは話したかい？
なんだか避けられているような気が
しないでもないんだけど――
MsgEn:
Did you talk to Iris?
I can't help but feel like she's avoiding me.

MsgJp:
もしかしたら、僕が覚者の力に
なれるのかもしれないな――
MsgEn: Perhaps, I may be able to become a powerful Arisen..

MsgJp:
いささか――怖いね
でも、ほら、白竜様がお待ちだよ
MsgEn: It's a little scary―― but look, The White Dragon is waiting for you.

MsgJp:
どうだい？
覚者の生活には慣れたかな？
MsgEn:
How about it?
Are you used to the life of an Arisen?

MsgJp:
ちょうど君が覚者になった頃からこれまでとは
少し違う事件が起こるようになってきた
オークの活動が活発になったり――
ほら、アークの出現もそうだね
MsgEn:
Since you became an Arisen, there have been different incidents occurring from before until now. 
The Orcs have become more active, and, well, the appearance of the Ark, too.

MsgJp:
そして、白竜様の回復を促す新しい方法も
見つかったみたいだ
これからも、もっと色々なことが
起こりそうな気がするよ
MsgEn:
And it seems that a new method to encourage the recovery of The White Dragon has been found.
I feel like more things are going to happen from now on.

MsgJp:
メイリーフを連れ出したフードの女って
やっぱり彼女だよな――
MsgEn:
The woman in the hood who took Mayleaf out...
I knew it was her.

MsgJp:
ディアマンテス――
イリスは確かにそう言ってたよね？
MsgEn:
Diamantes - 
Iris did say that, right?

MsgJp:
あははは――
こんなに神殿の近くが戦場になるなんて――
ああ、怖かった
MsgEn:
Ahahaha――
Who would have thought that the area near the temple would turn into a battlefield――
Oh, how scary.

MsgJp:
さびしいね――
仲良くなれそうな気がしたんだけど――
いや、仲良かったよね――
MsgEn:
It's lonely, isn't it...
I felt like we could become close...
No, we were close, right...

MsgJp:
命は白竜様の役に立ったとしても
キースヒルトが知っていた知識、知恵――
全部消えてしまった
MsgEn:
Even if the life was useful to Master White Dragon,
the knowledge, the wisdom that Keith Hilt knew--
it's all gone.

MsgJp:
やっぱり僕は生きているキースヒルトと
もっと話したかったよ――
MsgEn:
I knew I wanted to talk more with Keith Hilt.
I just wish I could have told you more--

MsgJp:
会議だなんて――
これは時間がかかるよ
MsgEn: A meeting? Oh, this is going to take some time.

MsgJp:
そんなことしている場合じゃないと思うけど
時間をもらえるのはありがたいことだから
僕は僕で独自に調べようと思っている
MsgEn: I don't think this is the time for that, but it's nice to have some time. I am thinking of researching on my own.

MsgJp:
まだ読み切れていない古文書もあるし
ここまで実際に体験したことを
評価し直す必要があるかもしれない
MsgEn: There are some ancient documents that have not yet been fully read, and I may need to reevaluate what I've actually done so far.

MsgJp:
僕も調査に行きたいんだよね――
でもここで騒ぐと余計に面倒な立場に
なってしまいそうだから我慢しているんだ
MsgEn:
I want to go investigate too--
but I'm holding back because making a fuss here might put me in an even more troublesome position

MsgJp:
おかしいよ――
第一のアークの調査は僕が担当したんだ
MsgEn:
That's strange--
I was in charge of investigating the first Ark.

MsgJp:
今度の調査だって僕が行けば前回との
比較ができたのに――
意見も全然聞いてもらえないし――はぁ
MsgEn:
If I were to go on this investigation, I would have been able to compare it to the last time -- 
But I don't get listened to at all -- sigh.

MsgJp:
僕は確かに錬金術師の末裔さ
でも、だからなんだと言うんだろうね
MsgEn:
I am indeed a descendant of an alchemist,
but so what?

MsgJp:
僕のことはジョゼフ様が一番よく知っている
はずなのに――
MsgEn:
You know me better than anyone, Joseph.
I should have known...

MsgJp:
気づいていたのに――
イリスは少し変わったなって
気づいていたんだ
MsgEn:
I had noticed--
that Iris had changed a little

MsgJp:
それなのに僕は――
悔やんでも悔やみきれないよ
MsgEn: And yet, I can't help but regret and regret.

MsgJp:
僕はね――もう後悔はしたくない
予兆には気づいていたのに――
遠慮する必要は何もなかったのに――
MsgEn:
I don't--I don't want any more regrets.
I knew the signs were there.
There was no need to hesitate...

MsgJp:
もう友達をなくすのは絶対に嫌だから
思ったことは口にするつもりだよ
MsgEn: I absolutely don't want to lose any more friends, so I intend to speak my mind.

MsgJp:
ここでジッとしてはいられない
僕もメルゴダへ行く！　絶対行く！
MsgEn: I can't stay still here. I'm going to Mergoda! I'm definitely going!

MsgJp:
ディアマンテスに対抗する錬金術師が
ちゃんといたことがうれしくてね
MsgEn: I am happy that there was an alchemist who could oppose Diamantes.

MsgJp:
だから僕は、こっち側の人たちと神殿の
架け橋になろうと思うんだ
MsgEn: That's why I want to become a bridge between the people on this side and the temple.

MsgJp:
君も協力してくれるよね？
もう結構長い付き合いだもの――
僕に野心がないことなんてわかってるだろ？
MsgEn:
You'll also help me, right?
We've been together for quite a long time, after all...
You know that I don't have any ambitions, don't you?

MsgJp: 時は来た――だね
MsgEn: The time has come--right?

MsgJp:
ずっと考えているんだけど――
ディアマンテスは僕が跡を継ぎたがるって
本気で考えたのかな――
MsgEn:
I keep thinking--
that Diamantes wants me to follow in his footsteps.
Did he really think--?

MsgJp:
だとしたら、哀れだね
出会ったばかりの僕しか後継者候補は
いないのか――ってさ
MsgEn:
If that's the case, it's pitiful, isn't it?
Are there really no other candidates for the successor besides me, someone you just met?

MsgJp:
嵐の中を出かけていった騎士たちには
頭が下がるよ
MsgEn:
To the knights who went out into the storm,
I salute you

MsgJp:
次は覚者の番だね
くれぐれも、気をつけて
MsgEn:
Next is the turn of the Arisen,
Please be careful.

MsgJp:
悪いね
ついついレオのことを考えてしまうんだ
こんな時にどうして留守なんだってね
MsgEn:
It's bad, isn't it?
I can't help but think about Leo.
Why is he absent at a time like this?

MsgJp:
他の人も思いは同じだと思うよ
つまり――
僕が言いたいのは、レオの後任は大変だけど
頑張ってくれってことさ
MsgEn:
I think other people feel the same way.
In other words--
What I want to say is, it's tough to be Leo's successor,
but I hope you will do your best.

MsgJp:
問題は、君とガルドリンが行ったという
島の場所だね
MsgEn:
The problem is the location of the
island you and Gurdolin say you went to.

MsgJp:
レスタニア中の海図がこの神殿に
集まることになっているんだ
船乗りたちと一緒に、その海図とにらめっこさ
MsgEn:
The charts of all of Lestania are to be gathered here in this temple.
I'll be poring over them with the sailors.

MsgJp:
大海原に浮かぶ島を見つけるなんて
そう簡単じゃない
MsgEn: It's not easy to find an island floating in the open sea.

MsgJp:
覚悟はしていたけどね――
いやいや、挫けてなるものか！
MsgEn:
I was prepared, you know――
No, no, I will not be deterred!

MsgJp:
島が見つかってホッとしているよ
肩の荷が下りたというかね
ここだけの話――
ジョゼフ様は僕を試しているね
MsgEn:
I feel relieved that the island has been found.
It's like a burden has been lifted off my shoulders.
Just between you and me--
Master Joseph is testing me.

MsgJp:
将来の神官にふさわしいかどうか――
ノドから手が出るほど欲しい地位だったけど
今はどうかな――
MsgEn:
Whether I am suitable to be a future priest--
Although I desired the position so much that I would give my right arm for it,
I wonder now, how about it--

MsgJp:
逐次攻略というか各個撃破というか
物事はひとつずつ解決するのが良策だと
主張する人もいるけどね――
MsgEn: Rather than calling it a step-by-step strategy, it's more like defeating each individual. Some people argue that it's best to solve things one by one, but I'm not sure that it's a good idea.

MsgJp:
僕は混乱の中で解決を模索するのが好きなんだ
つまり、この慌ただしさも僕の味方さ
MsgEn:
I enjoy seeking solutions in the midst of confusion.
In other words, this busyness is also on my side.

MsgJp:
島の調査は引き続きやっているよ
いい報告ができればいいんだけど
少々魔物が多くてね
MsgEn:
We are still conducting investigations on the island.
I hope we can make a good report,
but there are quite a few monsters.

MsgJp:
騎士団が時々掃討作戦を展開しているから
まあ、気長にね――
ああ気長！　僕たちの苦手なやつだよね
くう――
MsgEn:
Because the Knights sometimes conduct sweeps
Well, be patient--
Oh, patience!　We're not very good at that.
(sigh)

MsgJp:
レオが匿っているという人と話せれば
もっと色々と分かるのだろうけど
今はそれよりも侵食魔退治だね
まったく、次から次へと――
MsgEn: If I could talk to the person Leo is hiding with, I would probably understand more. But right now, it's more about defeating the Corruption. Seriously, it's one thing after another--

MsgJp:
例の島をね、もっとよく調べようと思うんだ
戦いは一段落ついたのかもしれないけど
調査は何も終わってないからね
MsgEn: I think I'll continue to investigate that island more thoroughly. Although the fighting may have come to a halt, the investigation is far from over.

MsgJp:
僕も島に乗り込みたいと思っていたけど
まだ時期尚早のようだね
もう少し状況が落ち着くのを待つよ
MsgEn:
I also wanted to join you on the island, but it seems it's still too early.
I'll wait a little longer for the situation to settle down.

MsgJp:
島に現れた魔物はこれまでの侵食魔とは
かなり様子が違うとか？
MsgEn: I hear the monsters that appeared on the island are considerably different from the previous Corruption?

MsgJp:
黒騎士と魔物の関係という観点から見ると
新手の方が、より黒騎士に近い存在という
ことかなあ
MsgEn: From the perspective of the relationship between the Black Knight and monsters, it could be said that the newcomer is a presence closer to the Black Knight.

MsgJp:
ロイグが早くよくなることを祈るよ
まあ、ロイグのためというよりは
かなり利己的な理由だけどね
MsgEn:
I hope Loeg gets better soon.
Well, it's not so much for Loeg's sake
but rather for quite selfish reasons.

MsgJp:
あやふやとはいえ、ロイグの方が色々と
覚えているからね
その情報だけでも、ありがたいと思わなくちゃ
MsgEn: Even if uncertain, Loeg remembers various things, so I must be grateful for that information alone.

MsgJp:
セシリーは深手を負っている
致命傷がなければ命は助かるだろうけど
回復には長い時間がかかるよ
MsgEn: Cecily has suffered a serious injury. If there is no fatal wound, she should survive, but recovery will take a long time.

MsgJp: まあ、今は生きのびてくれることを祈ろう
MsgEn: Well, let's pray that they'll survive.

MsgJp:
悔しいなあ
僕には知らないことがいっぱいある
それを思い知らされて――
ああ、悔しいよ
MsgEn:
It's frustrating.
There are so many things I don't know.
Being reminded of that...
Ah, it's frustrating.

MsgJp:
僕は君たちの一歩先のことを考えるとしよう
それが僕の仕事だよね？
MsgEn:
Let's say I'm one step ahead of you guys
That's my job, right?

MsgJp:
あのゲートはフィンダムの竜の力が
生み出したものだ
僕らの心意気だけじゃどうにもならないよ
MsgEn:
That gate is the result of the power of Phindym's dragon.
It can't be done with just our determination alone.

MsgJp:
ゲートの継続性について
もう少し確信が得られないと
僕は向こうへは行けないな
MsgEn:
Regarding the sustainability of the gate,
I cannot go over there without a little more certainty.

MsgJp: 覚者じゃないこの身が恨めしいよ
MsgEn: This body that is not an Arisen is filled with resentment.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様の話を聞いていると
まるで僕たちがフィンダムへの侵略者のように
思えてくるよ
MsgEn:
When listening to Joseph's story,
it feels as if we are invaders to Phindym.

MsgJp:
向こうとこっち――
立場は五分と五分――この考え方が
平和共存への道に繋がると思うんだ
MsgEn:
Over there and here, 
The positions are evenly split—I believe that this way of thinking 
Leads to peaceful coexistence.

MsgJp:
よく考えると、このレスタニアでも
竜の不調は続いているわけだよね
MsgEn: When I think about it, even in this Lestania, the dragon's condition continues to worsen, doesn't it?

MsgJp:
となると、レスタニアの混乱がこの程度で
済んでいるのは、とてつもなく運が
いいのかもしれないね
MsgEn: If that's the case, it might be incredibly lucky that the chaos in Lestania has been settled to this extent.

MsgJp:
フィンダムを竜力が巡る仕組みは
こっちとは少し違うようだね
MsgEn: The mechanism of Dragon Force circulating around Phindym seems to be a little different from here.

MsgJp:
竜と樹が循環と浄化を分け合っているというか――
竜への異存が少ないということなのかなあ
MsgEn: I wonder if it means that the dragon and the tree are sharing circulation and purification - or maybe it means that there is little objection towards the dragon.

MsgJp:
聞くところによると、セシリーのお父さんは
戦士でもなんでもない、普通の人らしいね
MsgEn: According to what I've heard, Cecily's father is not a warrior or anything, he seems to be an ordinary person.

MsgJp:
君だって、不安だろう？
早いところ、行った方がいいよ
MsgEn:
You're worried, too, aren't you?
You'd better get there as soon as possible.

MsgJp:
さあ、みんなが待ってるよ？
君がなんとかしてくれる――
そう思っている連中も多いはずさ
MsgEn:
Come on, the guys are waiting for you, okay?
You'll handle it--
I'm sure a lot of them think so.

MsgJp:
ロイグはガラダ族長たちのことを
快く思っていなかった
いや、逆恨みしていたという感じかな？
MsgEn:
Loeg did not have a favorable opinion of the Gearóid tribal leaders.
No, it's more like he held a grudge against them, I guess?

MsgJp:
その心の暗い部分に黒騎士が
入り込んだ――か
MsgEn: Did the Black Knight enter the dark depths of your heart?

MsgJp:
それにしてもあのロイグがね――
心根のいい奴に思えたけどなあ
僕の人を見る目もまだまだだね
MsgEn:
That Loeg, though...
He seemed like a good-hearted guy.
I still have a long way to go in judging people.

MsgJp:
回り道はあったけど、いよいよだね
良い報告を待っているよ
MsgEn:
There was a detour, but now it's time.
I'll be waiting for good news!

MsgJp:
浄化は始まっているんだろう？
進捗状況が気になるところだね
MsgEn:
I assume the purification has begun?
I'm curious to see the progress.

MsgJp:
くれぐれも気をつけてくれよ
無事にここへ戻って来ると約束してほしい
君たちは歴史の証言者なんだからね
MsgEn: Please be careful and make sure to return here safely. I want you to promise me that. You are witnesses to history, after all.

MsgJp:
これからフィンダムへの渡航者が増えるだろうね
もちろん僕も準備を進めているんだ
MsgEn: The number of travelers to Phindym is likely to increase from now on, and of course, I am also preparing for it.

MsgJp:
覚者が一緒じゃないと戻ってこられないから
君たち、その時はよろしくたのむよ
MsgEn: I cannot return without the Arisen being present, so I ask you all to take care of me at that time.

MsgJp:
フィンダムで起こったことを記録して
後世に残そうと思っているんだけど――
MsgEn: I want to record what happened in Phindym and leave it for future generations to see--

MsgJp: また何か起こりそうな気配だね
MsgEn: It feels like something is about to happen again.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランか
自然環境はこっちとほぼ同じなんだね
つまり、理と竜の世界ということか
MsgEn:
Is this Acre Selund?
The natural environment here is almost the same, right?
In other words, it's a world of order and dragons.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランの状況は良くないみたいだけど
それでも君たちはレスタニアの代表なんだ
MsgEn: The situation in Acre Selund doesn't seem to be good, but even so, you are representatives of Lestania.

MsgJp: 可能な限り、いい顔でたのむよ
MsgEn: Please do it with a smile, if possible

MsgJp: とにもかくにも今はネド王子だね
MsgEn: In any case, you are Prince Nedo now.

MsgJp:
解放軍はここに来てずいぶん敵を
刺激したからね
反撃は覚悟しないと
MsgEn: The Liberation Army has certainly stimulated the enemy since they have arrived here. We must be prepared for counterattacks.

MsgJp:
盗賊と言えば荒くれ者と相場が決まっている
本拠地に乗り込むんだから
言動には気をつけて
MsgEn:
When it comes to thieves, they are often considered rough individuals.
Since we are infiltrating their headquarters,
be careful with your words and actions.

MsgJp: ガルドリンには特に強く言っておかないと
MsgEn: I need to make sure to tell Gurdolin firmly.

MsgJp:
盗賊の次はオークの本拠地だって？
君たちはそっちの方が慣れているかな
MsgEn: Next is the orc's stronghold, huh? I wonder if you guys are more familiar with that.

MsgJp:
ネド王子と解放軍が合流したんだ
敵の警戒も厳しくなるだろうね
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo and the liberation army have joined forces
Enemy vigilance will also intensify, I suppose.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランで“悪しき竜”との
全面戦争が始まるのかな
MsgEn: Is a full-scale war against the "Evil Dragon" about to begin in Acre Selund?

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランとも、フィンダムのような
友好的な関係になれるといいね
MsgEn: I hope we can establish a friendly relationship with Acre Selund, just like with Phindym.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランに灯った希望の火を
消してはいけないよ
MsgEn: Do not extinguish the flame of hope that has been lit in Acre Selund!

MsgJp:
君たち自身も希望なんだ
それを忘れないでくれ
MsgEn:
You yourselves also have hope,
Please do not forget that.

MsgJp:
ひとつだけわかったのは――
“悪しき竜”はすぐに君たちを亡き者に
するつもりはないということ
MsgEn: The only thing I understood is that the "Evil Dragon" has no intention of taking you out immediately.

MsgJp: これは悪くない事だと思うよ
MsgEn: I think this is not a bad thing.

MsgJp:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
MsgEn: Joseph is currently a bundle of suspicion. It's not surprising no matter what he says.

MsgJp:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
MsgEn: Joseph is currently a bundle of suspicion. It's not surprising no matter what he says.

MsgJp: 本格的な城攻めを前にしての休暇かな？
MsgEn: Is it a vacation before a serious castle attack?

MsgJp:
レスタニアは平和なものさ
気分転換に散歩でもどうだい？
MsgEn:
Lestania is a peaceful place.
How about taking a walk for a change of mood?

MsgJp:
奪回した城を拠点に力を蓄えて
“悪しき竜”の討伐を目指すのだよね？
MsgEn:
To gather strength at the recaptured castle
and aim to defeat the "Evil Dragon," right?

MsgJp:
道のりはまだまだありそうだから
じっくり行かないとね
MsgEn:
The journey seems to still have a long way to go,
so we must proceed carefully.

MsgJp:
今朝、ぶつけて爪が欠けてしまってね
嫌な予感がするんだ
MsgEn:
I bumped it this morning and chipped a nail.
I have a bad feeling about this.

MsgJp:
謎の騎士の話題で持ちきりだね
正体はどうあれ、強敵に違いないから
万事準備怠りなく、だよ？
MsgEn: The topic of the mysterious knight is all the buzz, right? Regardless of their identity, they are definitely a formidable opponent. So, let's prepare ourselves for anything, okay?

MsgJp:
王都の戦いが終わらないと
落ち着かないよね
MsgEn: I can't calm down until the battle in the Royal Capital is over.

MsgJp:
今は解放軍と一緒に王都奪回の戦いに
専念するのがいいと思うよ
MsgEn: I think it's best to focus on the battle to recapture the Royal Capital with the Liberation Army.

MsgJp:
考え得る対策を書きだして
とにかく吟味する
MsgEn: Write down all possible measures and thoroughly scrutinize them.

MsgJp:
そして、良さそうなのがあれば
君たちにも伝えるからね
MsgEn:
And if there is something good,
I will also let you guys know.

MsgJp:
あれこれ書物に当たっているけど
こんな危機はかつてなくて
白竜様と僕たちが初めてのようだ
MsgEn: I'm hitting various books and such, but this crisis is unprecedented. It feels like The White Dragon and we are experiencing something for the first time.

MsgJp:
頼むよ――
黒騎士の剣を取り戻して
MsgEn:
Please, I beg you-
Retrieve the sword of The Black Knight.

MsgJp: さあ、急いで
MsgEn: Come on, hurry up.

MsgJp:
君たちを助けるセシリーの竜力は
あくまでも仮初めの力
そう長くは続かないと思うよ
MsgEn: Cecily's Dragon Force, which helps you, is merely a temporary power. I don't think it will last long.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの命運は尽きる寸前だった――
あはは――今になって脚が震えるよ
MsgEn:
Lestania's fate was on the brink of exhaustion ――
Ahaha―― My legs are trembling now.

MsgJp:
ネド王子はたしかにまだ子供だけど
聞く限り、無茶はしない印象だよ
MsgEn: Prince Nedo is certainly still a child, but from what I hear, he gives the impression of not doing anything reckless.

MsgJp:
姿を消したとなると、何か深い事情が
あるんだろうね
解決可能なことだといいけど――
MsgEn: If he disappeared, there must have been some deep reason behind it. I hope it's something that can be resolved.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様がまたなんか言ってるだろ？
人を疑うのが性分なんだね
MsgEn:
Joseph is saying something again, right?
It's in his nature to suspect others.

MsgJp:
これは王子なりによく考えた末の
行動だと思うよ
そうじゃないと、君たちから聞いていた
王子の印象と合わないからね
MsgEn: I think this is an action that the prince has carefully considered. Otherwise, it wouldn't match the impression of the prince that I have heard from you.

MsgJp: 王子には何か目的があるのだろうけど――
MsgEn: I'm sure the prince has a purpose, but--

MsgJp:
その目的を果たしたあとは
どんな顔をして仲間のところへ戻る気で
いるんだろうね
あまり考えていないのかな
MsgEn:
After achieving that goal,
I wonder what expression they will have
when they return to their comrades.
I wonder if they haven't thought about it much.

MsgJp: 火垂れ山は“悪しき竜”の住み処だよね
MsgEn: Firefall Mountain is the dwelling place of the "Evil Dragon," right?

MsgJp:
いつ襲撃されてもおかしくないから
四方八方、気を抜かないようにね
MsgEn: Since we could be attacked at any time, let's stay on high alert in all directions

MsgJp: 行ったり来たり、ご苦労だね
MsgEn: Going back and forth, you've had it tough.

MsgJp:
以前はうらやましいと思ったけど
最近は――ああ、僕も歳を取ったのかな
MsgEn:
I used to think it was enviable
But lately ―― ah, I guess I've also gotten older

MsgJp:
早くアッカーシェランへ向かった方がいいよ
状況は王子の動き次第で変わるんだから
MsgEn: It would be better to quickly head towards Acre Selund; the situation can change depending on the prince's movements.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”は力だけを与えられた子供――
そんなふうに考えられないかな？
MsgEn: Can't we consider the "Evil Dragon" as a child who has been bestowed with power alone?

MsgJp:
力だけで知識も経験も与えられなかったから
釣り合いが取れなくて――
いやいや、問題はそこじゃないか！
MsgEn:
They gave no knowledge, no experience, just power.
There was no balance...
No, no, no, that's not the point!

MsgJp:
誰が与えたか――与えなかったのか――
考えるべきなのは背後にいたのは
誰かって話だよね
MsgEn:
Who gave -- or didn't give --
What we should be thinking about is who was behind it

MsgJp: 何か心配事でも？
MsgEn: What's worrying you?

MsgJp:
気になることがあるのなら
さっさと解決しておくことを薦めるよ
MsgEn:
If there is something on your mind,
I recommend resolving it promptly.

MsgJp:
おまえたち覚者の力こそ
我々に残された希望だ
MsgEn:
The power of you Arisen is
the hope that remains for us.

MsgJp:
ふむ、年かな――
話したいことがあったはずだが、忘れてしまったよ
MsgEn:
Hmm, I wonder... Must be getting old――
I had something I wanted to talk about, but I forgot.

MsgJp:
白竜の意思を完全に理解することは難しい
たとえ巫女でもな
MsgEn:
It is difficult to fully understand the intentions of the White Dragon,
even if one is a priestess.

MsgJp:
我々は常に己を律し、不測の事態に備えねばならん
わかってはいるが――なかなか、なぁ
MsgEn: We must always discipline ourselves and be prepared for unforeseen circumstances. I understand this, but... it's quite difficult.

MsgJp:
覚者よ、頼んだぞ
おまえたちの働きが大勢を決める
MsgEn:
Arisen, I'm counting on you.
Your work will determine the outcome for many.

MsgJp:
竜の意志を紡ぐこと
それが我らを災いから救うのだ
MsgEn:
To weave the will of the dragon
That is what will save us from disaster

MsgJp:
どうした、不安なことがあるのか？
まず、おまえたちが落ち着かなくては
MsgEn:
What's wrong? Is there something that's making you anxious?
First, you guys need to calm down.

MsgJp:
悠々と、ただそこにある世界を前に――
我々はなんと小さく、稚拙な存在なのだろうな
MsgEn:
In front of the serene and simply existing world--
We are so small and immature, aren't we?

MsgJp:
わしほどの激動を生きた神官はいないだろうが
はて、喜ぶべきか嘆くべきか――
MsgEn: There could be no priest who has experienced such turmoil as I have. Well, should I rejoice or should I lament?

MsgJp:
日がな一日ここに立ち、竜を思い、政を思う
おまえたちを思う時間はほとんどないが、まあ許せ
MsgEn:
I stand here all day long, thinking about dragons and thinking about politics.
I don't have much time to think about you all, but well, it's forgivable.

MsgJp: 理の外の世界――
MsgEn: The world outside of Order--

MsgJp:
そんな世界があるとして、そこでは
どんな道理がはたらくのか――想像もつかんわ
MsgEn:
If there is such a world,
I can't imagine what kind of reasoning would work there--I can't imagine it!

MsgJp:
ああ、すまない
考えごとをしていてな
MsgEn: Ah, sorry. I was lost in thought.

MsgJp:
オーク臭いようだな
神殿では気をつけた方がいい
MsgEn:
I smell orcs in the air.
You better be careful in the temple.

MsgJp: 時間を見つけて外へ出てみるんだな
MsgEn: Find some time and go outside and see for yourself.

MsgJp:
覚者を育てるのは、結局のところ経験だ
いや、これは覚者に限らないがな
MsgEn: The cultivation of an Arisen ultimately comes down to experience. No, this applies not only to Arisens.

MsgJp:
近々、ある調査団を派遣することになってな
その人選で、いささか多忙だ
MsgEn:
I'm sending a survey team soon
and I'm somewhat busy with the selection process.

MsgJp:
ポーンとの契約は進んでいるか？
終わればいよいよ一人前の覚者だな
MsgEn: Is the contract with the Pawn progressing? Once it's finished, you'll finally become a full-fledged Arisen.

MsgJp:
ふむ――
順調に覚者としての階段を登っているようだな
頼もしいことだ
MsgEn:
Hmm―
It seems like you're steadily climbing the steps as an Arisen.
That's reliable.

MsgJp: 砦との往復は何度目だ？
MsgEn: How many times have you been to the fort and back?

MsgJp:
砦に限らず、あちこち自分の足で
行ってみることが大切だ
地図を眺めていても頭に入らんだろうからな
MsgEn:
It is important to go and see for yourself, not just in the fortress but also in various places.
Even if you look at the map, it won't make sense in your head.

MsgJp:
次から次へと――どうしてくれようか
オークどもの対処だけでも大変なのに
今度はアークだと？
MsgEn:
From one thing to another―― how are we supposed to handle this?
Just dealing with the orcs themselves is already tough enough,
and now it's the Ark?

MsgJp:
おまえも忙しくなるだろうから休める時には
休んでおくことだ
MsgEn:
You'll be busy too, so when you can take a break,
take it.

MsgJp:
メイリーフの正体は他言無用
約束だからな
MsgEn:
Mayleaf's true identity is a secret
it's a promise

MsgJp:
どこかへ行っていたのか？
ふむ――これは隠し事の臭いだな
MsgEn:
Did you go somewhere?
Hmmm... This has the smell of a secret.

MsgJp: イリスは本当に大丈夫なのか？
MsgEn: Is Iris really okay?

MsgJp:
覚者のことは覚者に任せるしかない
よく見ていてやるんだぞ
MsgEn:
We have to let the Arisen take care of the Arisen.
You're going to have to watch them very closely.

MsgJp: レオが悩んでいるようだが――
MsgEn: Leo seems to be having trouble--

MsgJp:
弱っているところをああも露骨に見せるのは
いかがなものかな――
MsgEn: Is it really necessary to make one's weaknesses so obvious...

MsgJp:
賛成しかねるが――
無為なことと断じるつもりもない
MsgEn: I cannot agree, but I have no intention of calling it meaningless.

MsgJp:
覚者に力を与えたぶんだけ
白竜自身の回復が遅れる――
そう考えることもできる
MsgEn:
For the Arisen, the more power they are given,
the slower The White Dragon's recovery becomes—
It can be thought of that way.

MsgJp:
覚者の本分は白竜の回復を助けることだ
――ゆめゆめ忘れるなよ
MsgEn:
The Arisen's true duty is to aid in the recovery of The White Dragon.
- Never, ever forget that.

MsgJp:
キースヒルトか――
ここで暮らしてくれれば安心なのだが
あの種族は偏屈だからな――
MsgEn:
Kieshildt――
If they live here, we can feel at ease
But that species is obstinate――

MsgJp: イリスを通じて敵を知る――ひとつの方策だ
MsgEn: Using Iris to understand the enemy――a single strategy.

MsgJp:
いや、わたしだって、驚いているし
胸も痛む――
MsgEn:
No, even I am surprised
and my heart hurts --

MsgJp:
しかし、敵に心奪われた者をこれまでどおり
信頼するわけにもいくまい
MsgEn: However, I cannot continue to trust someone who has been swayed by the enemy as before.

MsgJp:
アークを送り込みんできた者の名は――
いや、やめておこう
MsgEn:
The name of the person who sent the Ark is - 
No, let's stop here.

MsgJp:
おかしなものだ――
エルフはメイリーフだけではないと知ってから
心の隅で安心していた部分がある――
MsgEn:
It's strange--
Ever since I discovered that there are other elves besides Mayleaf,
there has been a sense of relief in the back of my mind.

MsgJp:
狙われるのはメイリーフだけではない、とな
自分の身勝手さに驚くしかなかったよ
MsgEn:
It was not only Mayleaf who was targeted.
I could only be surprised by my own selfishness.

MsgJp: 誇り高き孤独な魂――
MsgEn: Proud, lonely souls--

MsgJp:
我々で迎えることができてうれしいよ
ああ、これは本心だ
MsgEn:
I'm glad we can welcome you here.
Ah, this is sincere.

MsgJp:
会議に参加したい？
それよりも戦いの準備を進めてくれ
MsgEn:
Do you want to attend the meeting?
Please focus on preparing for the battle instead.

MsgJp:
どこへ行ってどう戦うべきか――
我々が考えるから、おまえは何も考えずに
戦ってくれればいい
MsgEn:
Where to go and how to fight――
Just fight without thinking, as we will do the thinking for you.

MsgJp:
会議の長さに不満が出ていることは知っている
しかし、事はレスタニアの未来に
大きく影響するだろう
MsgEn: I am aware that there is dissatisfaction with the length of the meeting. However, this matter will greatly impact the future of Lestania.

MsgJp: 慌てて結論に飛びついてはいかんのだ
MsgEn: We shouldn't jump to conclusions in a hurry.

MsgJp:
レオはまだか？
今後のこととイリスの処遇を相談せねばならん
見かけたら、すぐここへ来るように言ってくれ
MsgEn:
Is Leo here yet?
We need to discuss future plans and how to handle Iris.
If you see him, tell him to come here immediately.

MsgJp:
アークの攻略方法はわたしにまかせて――
ほら、今のうちに休んでおけ
MsgEn: Leave the strategy for the Ark to me - Now, go and rest while you can.

MsgJp:
ミシアルは最近のイリスにまつわる
うわさを知っていた
MsgEn: Mysial knew the recent rumors about Iris.

MsgJp:
つまり、警戒していたはずだ
それなのに何故――
MsgEn:
I mean, they should have been warned.
So why--

MsgJp:
まさかレオまで――
いや、それはあるまい――なあ？
MsgEn:
No way, not even Leo--
No, that's not-- hey?

MsgJp:
さあ、メルゴダへ行くんだ
向こうで誰と話――誰と戦うか
それは自分で決めればいい
MsgEn:
Now, you're going to Mergoda.
Who to talk to over there - who to fight.
You should decide that for yourself.

MsgJp:
おまえはけして間違えない
ああ、信じているとも
MsgEn:
You will never make a mistake
Ah, I believe in you

MsgJp:
レオとは会えたか？
わたしが心配していたと伝えてくれ
MsgEn:
Did you see Leo?
Tell him I was worried.

MsgJp:
さあ、今のうちに休んだり装備を見直したり――
いよいよ決戦だぞ
MsgEn:
Now, while you're at it, get some rest and review your equipment--
It's time for the showdown!

MsgJp: レオの姿が見えないがじきに戻るだろう
MsgEn: No sign of Leo, but he'll be back soon.

MsgJp:
白竜様へはおまえから報告するといい
つもる話はそれからでも遅くはない
MsgEn:
It is best to report to The White Dragon personally.
There is no harm in talking about it later.

MsgJp:
これほどの嵐――
史書の編纂が始まって以来なかったことだ
後世のために、詳細な記録を
残しておかねば
MsgEn:
Such a storm――
It has never happened since the beginning of the compilation of historical records.
For future generations, detailed records must be kept.

MsgJp: また落ち着かない日々が始まるようだな
MsgEn: Looks like another restless day ahead.

MsgJp:
ガルドリン、リズ、エリオットをうまく使って
この困難を乗り切ってくれ
むろん、わたしにできることはなんでもする
MsgEn:
Use Gurdolin, Lise, and Elliot effectively
to help us overcome this difficulty
Of course, I will do anything I can.

MsgJp:
何が起こっていようとも
我々が当事者でなければ良いと思っていたが
案の定、焼け石を拾ってしまったようだ
MsgEn:
Regardless of what may happen,
we had hoped that we wouldn't be involved,
but sure enough, it seems like we've picked up a burnt stone.

MsgJp:
見たところセシリーは、無垢な心を持った
乙女という風情だが――
MsgEn:
From the looks of it, Cecily has the air of a
maiden with an innocent heart...

MsgJp:
いったい何故セシリーが狙われねば
ならんのだ
MsgEn: Why on earth is Cecily being targeted?

MsgJp:
騎士団と覚者が力を合わせて戦えば
勝てぬ相手などおらん――
MsgEn:
When the knight order and the Arisen join forces and fight together,
There is no opponent we cannot defeat.

MsgJp:
そう信じているのだが、戦ってばかりでは
事態の把握は不可能
やはり戦力の分割は避けられぬわ
MsgEn: I believe that if we keep fighting all the time, it will be impossible to grasp the situation. I still cannot avoid the division of forces.

MsgJp:
問題は幾つもあるが
せめて侵食魔だけでも排除できないものだろうか
そうなれば人員配置が楽になるのだが
MsgEn: There are a number of problems, but can we at least eliminate the Corruption demon? That would make manpower allocation a lot easier.

MsgJp: レオは何か言ってこないのか？
MsgEn: Leo didn't say anything?

MsgJp:
状況が変われば考え方を変える
その柔軟さが美点だったが――
それすらも変わってしまったのだろうか
MsgEn:
If the situation changes, change your way of thinking
That flexibility was a virtue, but-
Has that even changed too?

MsgJp:
侵食魔どもめ――
奴らのせいでじっくり考える事もできん
MsgEn:
Those invaders--
they're the reason I can't even think straight.

MsgJp:
機先を制するには腰を据えた思索が
不可欠だというのに――
MsgEn: In order to take the lead, it is crucial to engage in in-depth contemplation and reflection.

MsgJp:
そろそろ明るい兆しが見えても良いはずだが――
セシリーには焦るなと言ったものの
一番落ち着くべきなのはわたしかもしれんな
MsgEn:
There should be a silver lining by now--
Although I told Cecily not to rush
I'm probably the one who needs to calm down the most.

MsgJp:
首尾はどうだ？
朗報を待っているぞ
MsgEn:
How'd it go?
I'm waiting for good news.

MsgJp:
精神的な強い衝撃が人の記憶を奪うという
話は昔から知られている
MsgEn: The story of a strong psychological impact that robs people of their memory has been known since ancient times.

MsgJp: セシリーの場合はどのような事情なのだろうな
MsgEn: I wonder what the circumstances are in Cecily's case.

MsgJp:
ロイグの病気がわたしの知るものであれば
相当苦しいはずだ
早く助けてやりたいものだな
MsgEn:
If Loeg's illness is what I think it is
he must be in a lot of pain
I hope I can help him soon.

MsgJp:
いやはや――
まったく――
MsgEn:
Oh my goodness - 
Absolutely -

MsgJp:
ロイグとセシリーの記憶合わせが
不調に終わってから
嫌な予感しかしないのだ
MsgEn: After trying to jog Loeg's and Cecily's memories and failing, I can't help but feel a sense of unease.

MsgJp:
今は――
セシリーを疎ましく思ったことを恥じて
回復を祈るばかりだ
MsgEn: Now... I only feel ashamed for thinking of Cecily with such animosity, and I can only pray for her recovery.

MsgJp:
頼むぞ
レオとおまえの間にどんな絆が――
あるいは確執があるのかは知らんが
今はセシリーを助けることを最優先してくれ
MsgEn:
Please,
whatever bond you have with Leo--
or whatever feud you have with him--
your priority right now is to help Cecily.

MsgJp:
セシリーが一命を取り留めた
憂いがひとつ消えたというわけだ
再び、前へ進もうではないか
MsgEn:
Cecily survived
So that's one sorrow gone.
Let's move forward again!

MsgJp:
もし時間があるのなら
たまにでいいから、島の様子を見てくれよ
MsgEn:
If you have the time,
just check in with me once in a while to see what's going on on the island.

MsgJp: 異郷の姿、その目でしかと見届けよ
MsgEn: See with your own eyes what it is like to be in another land.

MsgJp:
こちらのことは何も心配するな
それから――
フィンダムの住民と接触する時は
威厳を忘れずにな
MsgEn: Don't worry about anything here. And then, when interacting with residents of Phindym, don't forget your dignity.

MsgJp:
さあ、早くフィンダムに行ってやれ
無事を信じているとはいえ、ガルドリンの安否も
気になるところだ
MsgEn:
Come on, hurry up and go to Phindym
While I believe in his safety, I'm also concerned about Gurdolin's well-being.

MsgJp:
フィンダムのことはフィンダムの民たちが
よく知っているだろう
MsgEn: Phindym's people must know about Phindym.

MsgJp:
解決の方法も、何かあるのかもしれない
うまく聞きだして、手助けしてやりなさい
MsgEn:
There might be a solution, or something that can be done
Listen carefully and provide assistance

MsgJp:
《原始の雫》の到着を座して待つのも
手持ちぶさただろう
さあ、フィンダムへ行って、手伝ってやりなさい
MsgEn:
It would be boring to just sit and wait for the arrival of 《Primeval Drops》.
Now, go to Phindym and lend a hand.

MsgJp:
奪われた《原始の雫》――
多少出過ぎた真似をしてもかまわんから
必ず取り戻すのだぞ
MsgEn:
The stolen 《Primeval Drops》--
I don't care if you go a little overboard,
you must get them back!

MsgJp:
セシリーにはよくしてやるのだぞ？
ぜひ、強い友情の絆を結んでくれ
少々の利害の対立などに負けぬ、強い絆を
MsgEn:
I will treat Cecily well, okay?
Please, form a strong bond of friendship
Do not lose to small conflicts or disputes, maintain a strong bond.

MsgJp:
セシリーは重い責任に押し潰されそうに
なってはいないか？
側にいて、支えてやるといい
MsgEn:
Cecily, do you feel like you're being crushed under the weight of heavy responsibilities?
Stay by her side and support her.

MsgJp:
白竜はフィンダムの精霊竜ウィルミアに
語りかけようとしているがうまくいかないようだ
MsgEn: The White Dragon is trying to communicate with the spirit dragon Willmia of Phindym, but it doesn't seem to be going well.

MsgJp:
おまえたちも忙しいだろうが
気にしてみてくれ
MsgEn: You guys must be busy too, but please try to care.

MsgJp:
時に、ロイグの行方はまだわからんのか
もしや救いを求めているということはないか？
MsgEn:
Sometimes, is it still unknown where Loeg is.
Is it possible that he is seeking salvation?

MsgJp: 今一度会い、真意を聞いてみたいものだ
MsgEn: I would like to see him again and hear his true intentions.

MsgJp:
ロイグのことは聞いた
なんとも無念ではあるが――
MsgEn:
I heard about Loeg
It is truly regrettable but - -

MsgJp:
フィンダムの汚れとともに
あの男の闇も浄化されるだろうよ
MsgEn:
Together with the earth of Phindym,
his darkness will also be purified.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの完全な復興には
まだまだ時間がかかるだろう
時々訪ねて、経過を報告しておくれ
MsgEn: The complete recovery of Phindym will still take a long time. Please check in occasionally and report on the progress.

MsgJp: これは吉兆だ――良きことが始まる――
MsgEn: This is a good omen - good things are beginning.

MsgJp:
自分に言い聞かせようとしているが
なかなか――な
MsgEn:
I'm trying to tell myself that
but it's not easy to--

MsgJp:
異郷の地にひとり残るとは
エリオットの評価を改めねばならんな
MsgEn:
To remain alone in a foreign land,
I'll have to revise my assessment of Elliott.

MsgJp: 指示や助言をしようにも情報が足りんわ
MsgEn: Even if I try to give instructions or advice, there is not enough information.

MsgJp:
しばらくは、おまえたちの判断で
臨機応変に対応してくれ
MsgEn: For a while, please handle things flexibly and adapt as you see fit.

MsgJp: メイロワ将軍とはうまくやれそうか？
MsgEn: Do you think you and General Meirova will get along well?

MsgJp:
まずは王子が戻らないことには
どうにも動きようがないな
MsgEn:
First of all, if the prince doesn't come back,
there's no way to make a move.

MsgJp:
聞こえてくる話から想像するに
ネド王子の性根は悪くなさそうだ
友好的な関係を築いてくれよ
MsgEn: From the stories I hear, it seems that Prince Nedo is not a bad person at heart. He has built friendly relationships.

MsgJp:
敵の砦に乗り込むと聞いている
くれぐれも気をつけてな
MsgEn:
I hear you're going to ride into an enemy stronghold.
Take care.

MsgJp:
当面の目的であったネド王子の救出は
思惑通りに終わったわけだが――
MsgEn: The rescue mission of Prince Nedo, which was the immediate objective, has ended as planned.

MsgJp: 次の動きが気になるところだな
MsgEn: I'm curious about the next move.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の討伐が解放軍の目的とすれば
次はいかなる道を進むのか――
MsgEn:
If the goal of the Liberation Army is to defeat the "evil dragon,"
what path will it take next?

MsgJp:
協力を惜しむ必要はないが
レスタニアの利を忘れるなよ
MsgEn:
There is no need to be stingy with collaboration,
but don't forget about the benefit of Lestania.

MsgJp:
解放軍が勢い付いたことで
アッカーシェランの混乱はますます
拡大するだろう
MsgEn: With the recent momentum gained by the People's Liberation Army, the chaos in Acre Selund is expected to further escalate.

MsgJp: 短期決戦と相成ればよいが
MsgEn: I hope it's a short war.

MsgJp: 敵の攻勢は予想通りだ
MsgEn: The enemy's offensive is predictable.

MsgJp:
メイロワ将軍も策を講じていることだろう
しのぎきれば未来は明るいぞ
MsgEn:
General Meirova is also likely taking measures
If we endure, the future will be bright

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”め！
アッカーシェランの次はこのレスタニア――
MsgEn:
"Evil Dragon," beware!
After Acre Selund, is Lestania--

MsgJp:
それが狙いだというのなら
思い上がりも甚だしいわい
MsgEn:
If that's your intention,
it's extremely presumptuous.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
MsgEn:
Can we take the words of the "Evil Dragon" literally?
I don't know if I believe it.

MsgJp: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
MsgEn: Ah--the swamp of doubt is bottomless.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
MsgEn:
Can we take the words of the "Evil Dragon" literally?
I don't know if I believe it.

MsgJp: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
MsgEn: Ah--the swamp of doubt is bottomless.

MsgJp:
言うまでもないことだろうが――
城の奪回はそう簡単なことではないだろう
MsgEn:
I guess it goes without saying--
Taking back the castle won't be so easy.

MsgJp:
危険は避けられないとしても
無謀な行動は慎むのだぞ
MsgEn:
Even though danger is inevitable,
you must refrain from reckless behavior.

MsgJp:
奪われた城を取り戻すという悲願の成就
解放軍の面々はさぞ喜んでいるだろう
MsgEn:
The fulfillment of the long-held dream of regaining the castle that was taken from us
I'm sure the liberation army is very happy to see you.

MsgJp: 想像するとわたしまで頬が緩むわ
MsgEn: I can't help but smile when I think about it.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”が絶望の大陸と呼んだ
アッカーシェランの状況は大いに変わった
MsgEn:
The "Evil Dragon" referred to as the Land of Despair.
The situation of Acre Selund has greatly changed.

MsgJp: こうなると奴の沈黙が不気味だな
MsgEn: When it comes to this, his silence is eerie.

MsgJp:
おまえたちも同じだろうが、わたしの頭の中は
黒い鎧の騎士でいっぱいだ
MsgEn:
You guys are the same, right? But inside my head,
it's filled with black-clad knights.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”といい黒い騎士といい
姿を見せずに我々を翻弄するとは――
なんと卑劣な者たちだ
MsgEn:
"Evil Dragon" and the black knight, for that matter,
To manipulate us without showing their true forms—
How despicable these individuals are.

MsgJp: 落ち着け――落ち着くのだ
MsgEn: Calm down――You need to calm down.

MsgJp:
ブラッドオーブは続々と集まっているが
効果は薄いと言わざるをえないのだ
MsgEn: Blood orbs are gathering one after another, but it must be said that their effectiveness is weak.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの未来は文字どおり
おまえたちの活躍にかかっている
MsgEn: The future of Lestania depends on your actions

MsgJp:
思えば、わたしの記憶の中の白竜は
いつも病み、苦しんでいた
しかし、これほど痛ましい状況は初めてだ
MsgEn:
Looking back, the White Dragon in my memories
was always sick and suffering
However, this is the first time I have witnessed such a painful situation.

MsgJp:
もう一刻の猶予も許されないのだろう
さあ、行ってくれ
MsgEn:
I guess there is no time left for another moment of delay.
Now, please go.

MsgJp:
ごくろうだったな
ゆっくりと休んでくれ
MsgEn:
You've worked hard.
Please take a rest.

MsgJp:
いや、もちろん、歌い、食べ、大いに語るのもよい
好きにしなさい
多少のことは多めに見よう
MsgEn:
No, of course, it's good to sing, eat, and talk a lot. 
Do as you like.
Let's consider even the small things a little more.

MsgJp:
リズから聞いたところによると
ネド王子が行方不明なのだとか
しかも自分の意志で城を出たらしい
MsgEn:
According to what Lise told me,
it seems that Prince Nedo is missing,
and furthermore, he seems to have left the castle on his own accord.

MsgJp: この期に及んでいったい何事だろうな
MsgEn: What on earth is going on at this point?

MsgJp:
こんなことを言うとまた嫌われるのだろうが
アッカーシェラン側が口裏を合わせて
我々を騙そうとしている可能性も
皆無ではない
MsgEn: I may be disliked again for saying this, but there is a possibility that Acre Selund is conspiring and trying to deceive us.

MsgJp:
ほら、そんな顔をするな
あくまでも可能性の話だ
MsgEn:
Don't make that face.
It's just a discussion of possibilities.

MsgJp:
この状況――
これまでの経緯を思えば王子に悪意が
あるとは思えない
MsgEn: Given the situation ―― considering the previous circumstances, it is hard to believe that the prince has any ill intentions.

MsgJp:
しかし――
もう少し仕える者たちを大切にせねば
国を治めるのは難しいだろうな
MsgEn:
However...
If we do not value and appreciate those who serve us a little more,
it will be difficult to govern the country.

MsgJp:
もちろん王子の安全をいち早く確保して
気持ちを尊重すべく話し合うことも重要だ
MsgEn: Of course, it is important to promptly ensure the prince's safety and have respectful discussions.

MsgJp:
しかしそろそろおまえたちだけでも
気持ちを竜退治に切り替えた方が
良いのかもしれんぞ
MsgEn: However, perhaps it would be better for just you guys to start shifting your feelings towards defeating the dragon.

MsgJp:
ふん――
重大な事はいくらでもあるというのに
エリオットのことばかり考えてしまう
MsgEn:
Hmm――
Even though there are countless important things to consider,
I can't help but think only about Elliot.

MsgJp:
竜と竜力、そして大地の恵みが不可分で
ある以上、竜のいない大陸は
考えられない
MsgEn: Dragon and Dragon Force, along with the blessings of the earth, are inseparable. Therefore, a continent without dragons is unimaginable.

MsgJp:
とすれば竜力の継承抜きに竜の討伐は
考えられないとは思わんか？
MsgEn: Don't you think it's impossible to defeat a dragon without inheriting the power of Dragon Force Augmentation?

MsgJp:
いやはや――
この事件を記録に残さねばならないが
MsgEn:
Well, well...
I must record this incident.

MsgJp:
やはりわたしも一度はアッカーシェランを
訪ねる必要があるようだ
MsgEn: It seems that I also need to visit Acre Selund at least once.

MsgJp:
ほう、《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を持ってきたのか
これはまた貴重な物を手に入れたものだ
MsgEn:
Oh, you brought the 《LV.80 Orb of Growth》
This is quite a valuable item that you've obtained.

MsgJp:
これを使えば、今のジョブをLV.80に上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
――もちろん、ジョブポイントも上限まで貯まる
MsgEn:
With this, you can raise your current job to level 80.
You can also raise the limit for skills and abilities, except for special ones.
And of course, job points can be accumulated up to the new limit.

MsgJp:
これを持ってきたということは、今のジョブで
《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を使うのか？
MsgEn:
If you brought this, does that mean you will use
《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 with your current job?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
MsgEn:
I see.
It's valuable, so be sure to think carefully and use it.

MsgJp:
――これはすまぬ
そのジョブには《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》は
効果が無いのだ
別のジョブで考え直してみてくれ
MsgEn:
--Sorry about this
The 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 has no
effect on that job.
Think again with a different job.

MsgJp:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
MsgEn:
Now let us release the power of the Orb
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

MsgJp:
無事LV.80になったようだぞ
さて、次はスキルだな
――もう一度目を閉じるがよい
MsgEn:
It seems like I've safely reached level 80.
Now, it's time for skills.
―― Close your eyes once again.

MsgJp:
スキルの確認は落ち着いてからにしなさい
よし、最後はアビリティか
――目を閉じて集中するのだ
MsgEn:
Check your skills only after you've calmed down.
Okay, the last thing you need is abilities.
--Close your eyes and concentrate.

MsgJp:
これでこのジョブのアビリティも
特殊なもの以外は全ておまえのものとなったぞ
MsgEn:
Now all the abilities of this job
are yours, except for the special ones!

MsgJp:
どのように成長したかは
見た目ではわからないからな
アーチボルトのところへ行って
確認してみることをすすめるよ
MsgEn: How you have grown is not apparent from your appearance, so I recommend going to Archibald's place and checking to confirm.

MsgJp:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん
MsgEn:
It may take a little time to unleash the power of the treasure.
It would be better for the party to disband once and come back.
You may end up keeping the party members waiting unnecessarily.

MsgJp:
――気付いているだろうが
このジョブはすでにLV.80に達しているな
レベルアップの効果が無駄になってしまうが
それでも宝珠を使うのか？
MsgEn:
I guess you've noticed,
but this job has already reached level 80.
The effects of leveling up would be wasted,
but are you still going to use the treasure?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
ふむ――このジョブで《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、上げられるスキルが無いようだ
スキルに関する効果が無駄になってしまうが
宝珠を使ってもよいのか？
MsgEn:
Hmm―― It seems that there are no skills that can be raised even if you use the 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 on this job.
Although the effects related to skills will be wasted, is it okay to use the orb?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
これは――このまま《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、効果のあるアビリティは無いようだぞ
今のジョブで宝珠を使うのか？
MsgEn:
This... even if you use the 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 at this level, it seems there are no abilities to be raised.
Are you going to use the orb with your current job?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
MsgEn:
I see.
If you're satisfied,
I have nothing more to say.

MsgJp:
それでは、宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
MsgEn: Now, let us release the power of the Orb. Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

MsgJp:
これは強い竜力が篭められた宝珠だな
この宝珠の力を解放して白竜に捧げれば
おまえの《竜力の継承》は完全なものとなるだろう
MsgEn:
This is a jewel imbued with strong Dragon Force.
If you offer it to the White Dragon, your 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 will become complete.

MsgJp:
ここに持ってきたということは
今、この宝珠の竜力を解放してもよいのか？
MsgEn: Does bringing it here mean that I am now allowed to unleash the Dragon Force contained within this jewel?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
ほう――
すでにすべての《竜力の継承》を
終えているのだな
MsgEn:
Hmm...
You have already completed the "Dragon Force Augmentation" inheritance, haven't you?

MsgJp:
この宝珠は自らの力で腕を磨いたおまえには
不要なものだったようだ
まさに覚者の鑑よ
MsgEn: It seems that this orb was unnecessary for you, who has polished your skills on your own. Truly, you are an Arisen.

MsgJp:
《竜力の継承》には何の影響もないが
前途を祝して、宝珠の力を解放しておくか
力は大地を巡り、またいつの日か
おまえの元へ戻ろう
MsgEn:
While there is no effect on 《Dragon Force Augmentation》,
In celebration of the future, should we release the power of the jewel?
The power will revolve around the land and one day,
it will return to you.

MsgJp:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
MsgEn: All the 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 have been completed. Confirm what kind of power you have obtained!

MsgJp:
おまえが持ってきたこの宝珠
篭められた力を解放することで
より冒険がしやすくなるというものだ
MsgEn: The Orb that you brought with you is said to make it easier to embark on adventures by unleashing its hidden power.

MsgJp:
たとえば、各エリアランクが上昇したり
リム転移先とできる礎が解放されるといった
働きだな
MsgEn:
For example, it works by increasing the rank of each area or
releasing Portcrystals that can be used as a Rift Teleport destination.

MsgJp: ――さて、この宝珠の力を解放するか？
MsgEn: Now then, should we unleash the power of this orb?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
そういえば、おまえはすでに
かなりの礎に触れ、エリアに貢献して
きたのではないか？
MsgEn:
Come to think of it, you've already touched
quite a few Portcrystals and contributed
to the area, haven't you?

MsgJp:
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
さしたる効果は得られないかもしれぬ
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
MsgEn:
Even if the power of this Orb is released,
there may not be any significant effect obtained.
Nevertheless, may I release the power of this Orb?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
宝珠の力を解放することで
各地とおまえの結び付きは
より強固なものとなるだろう
MsgEn:
By releasing the power of the Orb,
your ties to the regions will
grow stronger.

MsgJp:
宝珠の力を解放したぞ
本来の効果は得られずとも
解放した力は大地を巡り
またいつの日かおまえの元へ戻るだろう
MsgEn:
I have unleashed the power of the Orb.
Even if the original effect cannot be obtained,
The unleashed power will traverse the land,
And one day, it will surely return to you.

MsgJp:
ほう、
《<VAL>》
を持ってきたのか
これはまた貴重な物を手に入れたものだ
MsgEn:
Wow,
You brought 《<VAL>》!

This is another valuable thing you've got.

MsgJp:
これを使えば、今のジョブを上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
MsgEn:
With this, you can raise your current job
and your skills and abilities to the
maximum, except for special ones.

MsgJp:
《<VAL>》
この宝珠の力を解放するか？
MsgEn:
《<VAL>》
Will you release the power of this treasure?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん
MsgEn:
It may take a little time to unleash the power of the treasure.
It would be better for the party to disband once and come back.
You may end up keeping the party members waiting unnecessarily.

MsgJp:
ふむ――このジョブでは
《<VAL>》
を使っても
レベルアップの効果が無駄になってしまうが
それでも宝珠を使うのか？
MsgEn: Hmm... In this job, even if you use《<VAL>》, the effects of leveling up will be wasted. Are you still going to use the treasure orb?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
ふむ――このジョブで
《<VAL>》
を使っても、解放するスキルが無いようだ
スキルに関する効果が無駄になってしまうが
宝珠を使ってもよいのか？
MsgEn: Hmm―― It seems that there are no skills to release by using 《<VAL>》 in this job. Although the effects related to skills will be wasted, is it okay to use the orb?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
これは――このまま
《<VAL>》
を使っても、開放するアビリティは無いようだぞ
それでも、今のジョブで宝珠を使うのか？
MsgEn: This... even if you use the《<VAL>》as is, it seems there are no usable abilities. Are you going to use the orb with your current job?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
MsgEn: I see. If you're satisfied, I have nothing more to say.

MsgJp:
――よろしい
無事、レベルがあがったようだぞ
MsgEn:
-- Good.
Looks like you're safe and leveled up.

MsgJp:
――よろしい
無事、スキルが解放されたようだぞ
MsgEn:
――Alright.
It appears that the skill has been unlocked successfully.

MsgJp:
――これで
アビリティは無事、解放されたようだぞ
MsgEn: ――It seems that the abilities have been successfully unlocked.

MsgJp:
さあ、行け覚者よ
白竜様の加護があらんことを――
MsgEn:
Now, go forth, Arisen
May you be blessed by the White Dragon's grace.

MsgJp:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
MsgEn:
Now let us release the power of the Orb
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

MsgJp:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
MsgEn:
I see.
It's valuable, so be sure to think carefully and use it.

MsgJp:
ほう、これは
《<VAL>》
だな
MsgEn:
Well, this is
《<VAL>》

MsgJp:
これを使えば、今のジョブの
スキルやアビリティを
解放することができる
MsgEn: By using this, you will be able to unlock the skills and abilities of your current job.

MsgJp:
《<VAL>》
この宝珠の力を解放するか？
MsgEn:
《<VAL>》
Will you release the power of this treasure?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
ほう――
すでにすべての《竜力の継承》を
終えているようだぞ
MsgEn:
Hmm...
You have already completed the "Dragon Force Augmentation" inheritance, haven't you?

MsgJp:
おまえはすでに多くのエリアに貢献している
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
さしたる効果は得られないかもしれぬ
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
MsgEn:
You have already contributed to many areas.
Even if the power of this Orb is released,
there may not be any significant effect obtained.
Nevertheless, may I release the power of this Orb?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
転移の礎に何の影響もないが
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
MsgEn:
Even if the power of this Orb is released,
it will have no effect on the Portcrystals.
Nevertheless, may I release the power of this Orb?

MsgJp:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
MsgEn: All the 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 have been completed. Confirm what kind of power you have obtained!

MsgJp:
――うむ
これで各地のエリアとおまえの結び付きは
より強固なものとなるだろう
MsgEn: This will strengthen the connection between each area and yourself

MsgJp:
――これで
転移の礎は無事、解放されたようだ
MsgEn: ――With this, it seems that the Portcrystals have been successfully unlocked.

MsgJp: どうした、深刻な顔だな
MsgEn: What's wrong? You look serious.

MsgJp:
覚者であることには慣れたか？
道は――見えたか？
MsgEn:
Have you become accustomed to being an Arisen?
Did the path become visible?

MsgJp: 体は常に鍛えておけよ
MsgEn: You've got to keep your body in shape.

MsgJp:
悪いな
茶飲み話なら、後にしてくれ
MsgEn:
Sorry
If it's just casual conversation, please save it for later.

MsgJp:
覚者として生きるということは
白竜と世界の行く末を見届ける――ということだ
MsgEn: To live as an Arisen means to witness the fate of The White Dragon and the world.

MsgJp: やるべきことをやろう――お互いにな
MsgEn: Let's do what we have to do--for each other.

MsgJp:
気を抜くなよ
絶対に安全な場所なんてのは無いからな
MsgEn:
Don't let your guard down.
There is no such thing as an absolutely safe place.

MsgJp:
腕試しに一戦やるか？
おっと、そんな顔するな――冗談さ
MsgEn:
You want to try your hand at a fight?
Oops, don't give me that look--I'm kidding.

MsgJp:
おまえは感じたことはないか？
自分の真ん中を貫く、熱いモノ――
それが揺らぎ、壊れてしまう不安を
MsgEn:
Have you ever felt it?
The intense thing that pierces through your core -
The uncertainty that wavers and breaks.

MsgJp:
忘れるな
俺たちは覚者――使命に生き、使命に死す者だ
MsgEn:
Do not forget
We are the Arisen - those who live and die for the mission.

MsgJp: どうした。俺には遠慮は無用だ
MsgEn: What's wrong? No need to hesitate with me.

MsgJp: 覚者ひまなし――いつものことだ
MsgEn: There is no free time for an arisen――as always.

MsgJp:
言っておくが、俺が面倒を見てやれるのは
おまえが行くべき場所――
戦うべき相手の指示だけだ
MsgEn:
Let me make it clear, the only thing I can do for you is
to give you directions on where you should go -
only instructions on who you should engage in battle with.

MsgJp:
衣食の面倒までは見切れないから
自分でなんとかしてくれ
MsgEn:
I can't take care of your food and clothing, so
you're on your own.

MsgJp:
時間を作って、なるべく歩きまわれ
神殿をくまなく見て回るのもいいし
遠出してみるのもいいだろう
MsgEn:
Make time to walk around as much as possible.
You can look all over the temple or
go far away!

MsgJp:
探究心を忘れず、常に新しいものに触れろ
覚者の人生は長い
退屈すると――つらいぞ
MsgEn:
Explore without forgetting your heart and always touch something new.
The life of an Arisen is long.
It is painful to be bored.

MsgJp: アークの話は知っているか？
MsgEn: Do you know the story of the Ark?

MsgJp:
派遣した調査団が調べているのだろうが
早く正体を知りたいものだな
MsgEn:
I wonder what the dispatched investigation team is examining.
I really want to know their true identity soon.

MsgJp: メイリーフがなついているようだな
MsgEn: Looks like you've got a soft spot for Mayleaf.

MsgJp:
よし、今後、あの子のことは
おまえに任せるとしよう
MsgEn:
All right,
I'll leave her in your hands from now on.

MsgJp:
ご苦労だったな
とりあえず今は何もない
MsgEn:
You went through a lot of trouble.
For now, there is nothing.

MsgJp: 休むか遊ぶか――好きにしてくれ
MsgEn: Rest or play――do as you please.

MsgJp:
イリスの件で動いてくれたそうだな
俺からも礼をいう
世話になった
MsgEn:
I've heard that you took action regarding the matter concerning Iris.
I also want to say thank you.
I appreciate your assistance.

MsgJp:
いいのか――
俺たち覚者はこのままでいいのだろうか――
MsgEn:
Is this okay――
Are we, the Arisen, fine as we are――

MsgJp:
白竜の力――
少しでも多く継承できれば――
MsgEn: The power of the White Dragon - If even a little can be inherited -

MsgJp:
多少無理をしてでもメイリーフを
連れ戻して欲しかったが――
まあ、今はそのキースヒルトを信じるしか
ないようだな
MsgEn:
No matter how unreasonable it may be, I wanted you to bring Mayleaf back...
Well, it seems like now I have no choice but to believe in Kieshildt.

MsgJp:
メイリーフも普通の娘ではないから
そう簡単に敵の手に落ちたりはしないだろう
MsgEn: Mayleaf is not an ordinary girl, so she wouldn't easily fall into the hands of enemies.

MsgJp:
彼女の信頼を裏切るような者がいれば
話は別だが――
MsgEn: If there is someone who betrays her trust, it's a different story...

MsgJp:
イリスのことは俺にまかせてくれ
長い付き合いだ
MsgEn:
I'll take care of Iris.
We've known each other a long time.

MsgJp:
話せば――わかるさ
ああ――きっとわかる
MsgEn:
Talk to him--you'll understand.
Yeah--you'll understand.

MsgJp:
敵の会話に登場したエルフとは
間違いなくキースヒルトのことだ
狙われているとあれば放ってはおけない
MsgEn: Whoever the elf mentioned in the enemy's conversation is, it's definitely Kieshildt. If they're being targeted, I can't just leave them alone.

MsgJp:
腐れモゴックめ――
ただですむと思うなよ
MsgEn:
Mogok, you rotten scoundrel――
Don't think you'll get off easy.

MsgJp: キースヒルトの死はけして無駄ではない
MsgEn: The death of Kieshildt is by no means in vain.

MsgJp:
白竜に命が捧げられる限り――
誰の命も無駄にはならない
MsgEn:
As long as a life is dedicated to the White Dragon--
No one's life will be wasted.

MsgJp: ディアマンテス――
MsgEn: Diamantes--

MsgJp:
その男がアークを送り込み――
ズールを使ってオークを取りまとめ――
イリスの正気とキースヒルトの命を奪った――
MsgEn:
The man sent the Ark--
using Zuhl to gather the Orcs--
and took away Iris's sanity and Kieshildt's life--

MsgJp:
何者だ、ディアマンテス――
いや、聞いたことはある
レスタニアを繁栄の世界から戦場に変えた
張本人――
MsgEn:
Who are you, Diamantes--
No, I've heard of you before.
You're the one who turned Lestania from a prosperous world into a battlefield,
The mastermind--

MsgJp: どこにいる――今すぐにでも倒してやる！
MsgEn: Where are they - I'll take them down right now!

MsgJp:
ジョゼフが最善を尽くそうとしていることは
わかっているが――さすがに焦れるな
MsgEn: I understand that Joseph is doing his best, but- understandably- he gets impatient.

MsgJp:
覚者として生きることに
見返りを求めたことはなかったが
MsgEn: As an Arisen, I have never sought anything in return for living this way.

MsgJp: この仕打ちは――なんだ――
MsgEn: What is this strike- what is it?

MsgJp:
何？
わたしの顔に、何かついてる？
MsgEn:
What?
Do I have something on my face?

MsgJp: 難しい顔しちゃって――悩みでもあるの？
MsgEn: You look so concerned - what's troubling you?

MsgJp:
楽しい時間って、限られてるから
価値あるんだよね
MsgEn: Fun times are limited, so it's worth it.

MsgJp:
わたしには力がある
だから、それを使うのは当然――うん、当然
MsgEn:
I have the power
So, it's only natural to use it - yes, naturally!

MsgJp:
わからないんだよね
何が正しくて、何が間違ってるのか――
MsgEn:
I don't know, you know.
What is right and what is wrong -

MsgJp:
敵を倒して、魔物を狩って――
もっと強くなれば別の生き方が見えるのかな
MsgEn:
Defeat the enemies and hunt the monsters――
If I become stronger, will I be able to see a different way of living?

MsgJp:
さあ、どうするの？
覚者なら、迷いなんてないでしょ？
MsgEn:
Well, what are you going to do?
If you are Arisen, you shouldn't have any doubts, right?

MsgJp: ――あんた目付き、レオに似てきたね
MsgEn: You have a similar expression to Leo, huh.

MsgJp:
自信持っていいんじゃない？
あんたなら、できそうな気がする
MsgEn:
You should have confidence.
I think you can do it.

MsgJp:
結局さ、どうなるかわかんないよね
世界なんてさ
MsgEn:
In the end, you never know what will happen, you know?
The world and all that.

MsgJp: なに？　なになに？
MsgEn: What?　What, what, what?

MsgJp:
あんたなかなかやるよね
これでわたし、楽できるかも？
MsgEn:
You're quite good, aren't you?
Maybe this will make things easier for me.

MsgJp: そういえば、ファビオって覚者とは会った？
MsgEn: By the way, have you met Fabio, the Arisen?

MsgJp:
いい奴だから、覚えておきなよ
ファビオね、ファビオ
MsgEn:
He's a good guy, so remember him.
Fabio, right, Fabio.

MsgJp:
ああ、忙しい――
誰かさんの人使いが荒いのか
わたしの要領が悪いのか――
MsgEn:
Oh, I'm so busy--
Either someone's not being very helpful...
Or maybe I'm just not very good at what I do.

MsgJp:
手伝ってあげられなくてごめんよ
わたしはわたしで忙しくてさ
MsgEn:
I'm sorry I can't help you.
I'm busy with my own things.

MsgJp:
さっそくご活躍だね！
うん、いいよぉ
MsgEn:
You're doing great already! 
Yeah, sure!

MsgJp:
あんたが頑張ってくれるとわたしがちょっと
楽になるからね！
MsgEn:
If you work hard, I'll be a little
relieved!

MsgJp: わくわくするね
MsgEn: I'm excited, aren't you?

MsgJp:
重要な話か？
違うなら後にしてくれ
MsgEn:
Is it an important conversation?
If not, please postpone it.

MsgJp: ふん――ひまそうだな
MsgEn: Hmm, it looks like you have some free time, huh?

MsgJp:
時間があるのなら
外の魔物でも倒してきたらどうだ
MsgEn: If you have time, why don't you go and defeat some monsters outside?

MsgJp:
規律なくして人は動かぬ
例外は――ない
MsgEn:
Without discipline, people will not work.
There are no exceptions.

MsgJp:
覚者とは、常に責務を負う者
白竜に、地に、人に――
すべてに仕える者だということを忘れるな
MsgEn:
The Arisen is someone who always bears responsibility.
To the White Dragon, to the land, to the people—
never forget that they serve everyone.

MsgJp:
くれぐれも己の力に溺れるなよ
どんな戦士も、過信という泥沼には
簡単に足を取られる
MsgEn: Please do not indulge in your own power. Any warrior can easily get trapped in the quagmire of overconfidence.

MsgJp:
覚者は勝手な連中が多いが――
貴殿は悪習に染まるなよ
MsgEn:
Arisen often tend to be a bunch of troublemakers, but...
Don't let yourself be tainted by bad habits.

MsgJp:
死を覚悟し、同時に生を諦めないこと
それが戦場で生きのびる秘訣だ
MsgEn:
Be prepared to die and not give up on life at the same time.
That's the secret to survival on the battlefield. To face death and at the same time not give up on life,
That is the secret to surviving on the battlefield.

MsgJp:
人智を超えた敵であろうと、我らは戦わねばならない
それが騎士というものだ
MsgEn:
We must fight even against enemies beyond human understanding.
That's what knighthood is all about!

MsgJp:
覚者といえども軍規には従ってもらう
仲間の命を守るためだ
MsgEn: Even though they are awakened, they must obey military regulations. It is to protect the lives of their comrades.

MsgJp: ほう？　我々騎士団に何用だ
MsgEn: What?　What do you want with us Knights?

MsgJp:
礼節を忘れるな
この《謁見の間》では特にな
MsgEn:
Do not forget the etiquette
In this 《Audience Chamber》, especially

MsgJp:
グリッテン砦のヴァネッサ殿が
来ているようだが――
騎士団は蚊帳の外か？
MsgEn:
It seems that Lady Vanessa of Fort Gritten is
coming--
Is the knights order out of the loop?

MsgJp:
騎士団の犠牲は竜の力となることで
報われる――ああ、そうとも
MsgEn: The sacrifice of the knights will be rewarded with the power of the dragon - oh, indeed.
